body:
See https://travis-ci.org/LLNL/spack/jobs/187996732 for details. Looks like it is complaining about [this line](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/blob/develop/lib/spack/spack/file_cache.py#L152).
```
TypeError: exceptions must be old-style classes or derived from BaseException, not str
```
title: Tests failing for Python 2.6
